contest-event.event-date:
May 2, 1891 D Heap Bridge Contest
Heap Bridge Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
heap-bridge-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
The Bohemian Girl [arr. Round]
Wash Lane, Bury 2nd annual contest promoted by Heap Bridge Band. When draw was first made band no 1 did not appear. Subsequently all other bands refused to go on and were all fined 10 shillings. When called again all bands played in order. Millgate and Littledborough were disqualified for refusing to pay 10 shilling fine. (Brass Band News June 1891) 9 bands competed. 15 bands entered, 9 competed.
Dec. 1, 2017, 3:41 p.m. May 27, 2019, 4:23 p.m.
1 Stalybridge Borough Alexander Owen
2 Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen
3 Denton Original Alexander Owen
4 East Lancashire Concert Band John Gladney Jnr
5 Irwell Bank Alexander Owen
